statements: SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY location_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM warehouse_layout WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT location_name, resource_type, quantity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE resource_type = 'pallet'
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE location_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT location_id, location_name, resource_type, quantity FROM warehouse_layout
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT location_name, resource_type FROM warehouse_layout WHERE quantity < 20 ORDER BY location_id ASC
SELECT location_id, location_name, resource_type, quantity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE resource_type = 'Pallets' AND quantity = 30
SELECT location_name, quantity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE location_name LIKE '%Zone%'
SELECT location_id, resource_type, quantity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE resource_type IN ('Boxes', 'Pallets')
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT warehouse_id, location_x, location_y FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT warehouse_name, location_x FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, location_x, location_y FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location_x, location_y FROM warehouse_layout WHERE location_y > 100;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT warehouse_name, location_x, location_y FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM storage_locations WHERE warehouse_id = 2 GROUP BY warehouse_id;

SELECT warehouse_name, rack_number, shelf_number FROM warehouse_layout JOIN storage_locations ON warehouse_layout.warehouse_id = storage_locations.warehouse_id WHERE rack_number >= 2 AND shelf_number <= 5 ORDER BY rack_number ASC, shelf_number DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT warehouse_name, location_x FROM warehouse_layout WHERE location_y > 0;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_location WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM product ORDER BY quantity_on_hand DESC
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE salary > 50000
SELECT location_name FROM warehouse_location WHERE shelf_capacity > 50
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM employee
SELECT * FROM warehouse_location WHERE shelf_capacity > 100 ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM employee WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY job_title ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM product WHERE warehouse_location_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity_on_hand DESC
SELECT location_name, shelf_capacity FROM warehouse_location ORDER BY location_id ASC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, job_title, salary FROM employee WHERE job_title LIKE '%Manager%'
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM StorageLocation ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT warehouse_id, COUNT(*) AS total_allocations FROM AllocationHistory GROUP BY warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_id = 1;

SELECT WarehouseLayout.warehouse_id, StorageLocation.location_name, ResourceAllocation.resource_name, AllocationHistory.allocation_date FROM WarehouseLayout JOIN StorageLocation ON WarehouseLayout.warehouse_id = StorageLocation.warehouse_id JOIN ResourceAllocation ON StorageLocation.location_id = ResourceAllocation.quantity JOIN AllocationHistory ON WarehouseLayout.warehouse_id = AllocationHistory.warehouse_id WHERE AllocationHistory.allocation_id = 1;
SELECT warehouse_id, COUNT(*) AS num_locations FROM StorageLocation GROUP BY warehouse_id ORDER BY num_locations DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_id IN (SELECT warehouse_id FROM StorageLocation WHERE capacity > 1000);
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, area FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM inventory_history ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, sum(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM product_inventory GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, location_id FROM warehouse_layout WHERE area > 100 ORDER BY warehouse_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM storage_locations WHERE shelf_count BETWEEN 5 AND 10 AND max_capacity < 1000
SELECT staff_name, position, salary FROM warehouse_staff WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT action_type, action_timestamp, user_id FROM inventory_history ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
